summary: A test suite that verifies the functionality of voice activity detection utilities, covering label alignment to frames, conversion of frame-level labels into speech segments, creation of per‑file VAD objects, extraction of nonspeech intervals, and parsing of RTTM files into pyannote-compatible annotations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability of VAD-related components in the speech recognition workflow, ensuring accurate speech/non‑speech segmentation and proper handling of overlapping speech for downstream ASR processing.
